item.title: Lambda Function for Data Wrangling
item.description:
Coming from a math background, to me, Lambda's represented the parameter in exponential distributions, eigenvalues in linear algebra, or in the context of AWS Lambda, a compute service for managing servers!

Whereas in programming, by definition, Lambda is is an anonymous function. This means that unlike normal functions definitions, Lambdas â€¦
item.dc:creator: Garry Chan
